name: Laser Lines
description:
Description:

Laser Lines is a game featuring local-multiplayer with up to 4 total players. Competitors battle against each other while attempting to avoid the continuously growing laser lines, trap other players, and be the last one standing. Any collision with a line, including your own, will result in being eliminated from the round until the next one begins. Once a player reaches 10 points, the game ends and the player is crowned champion.

Laser Lines also offers a singleplayer mode with the same rules, but against artificial intelligence.

Controls:

Menu:

Arrow keys to change options

Backspace to go to previous screen

Enter to go to next screen

Singleplayer controls:

(You are red)

Left arrow key to turn counter-clockwise

Right arrow key to turn clockwise

Multiplayer controls:

Red player:

Left arrow key to turn counter-clockwise

Right arrow key to turn clockwise

Blue player:

A to turn counter-clockwise

D to turn clockwise

Yellow player:

F to turn counter-clockwise

H to turn clockwise

Green player:

J to turn counter-clockwise

L to turn clockwise

Made for #lowrezjam

Enjoy!
